dmca.title: John Adams Illegal Bit-Torrent Downloads DMCA Violation Notice
dmca.body:
Hello, we have received a DMCA notice and copyright infringement claim from HBO and their Attorneys regarding the illegal download and or distribution of the HBO Television Series, "John Adams" via your IP as detailed below:

INFRINGEMENT DETAIL
--------------------

Infringing Work: John Adams
First Found: 1 Apr 2008 18:07:25 EDT (GMT -0400)
Last Found: 1 Apr 2008 18:07:25 EDT (GMT -0400)
IP Address: 000.000.000.000
IP Port: 61333
Protocol: BitTorrent
Torrent InfoHash: CFE352E41745DB77FE54AB02ABF9CCD0B27EFD8A
Containing file(s):
John.Adams.Part2.HDTV.XviD-LOL.avi (734,357,504 bytes)


Infringing Work: John Adams
First Found: 2 Apr 2008 02:52:25 EDT (GMT -0400)
Last Found: 2 Apr 2008 02:52:25 EDT (GMT -0400)
IP Address: 000.000.000.000
IP Port: 61333
Protocol: BitTorrent
Torrent InfoHash: 5EE7BD856326493689B345B80FCA9682F2353D5A
Containing file(s):
John.Adams.Part3.HDTV.XviD-LOL.avi (732,989,440 bytes)


Infringing Work: John Adams
First Found: 1 Apr 2008 23:52:14 EDT (GMT -0400)
Last Found: 1 Apr 2008 23:52:14 EDT (GMT -0400)
IP Address: 000.000.000.000
IP Port: 61333
Protocol: BitTorrent
Torrent InfoHash: 672553D7C772FA1E29E2F34DD0BDE28B4F30D59D
Containing file(s):
John.Adams.Part1.HDTV.XviD-LOL.avi (733,321,216 bytes)

As per the DMCA located here: http://www.mia.net/HTML/copyright/index.html we are obligated by law to comply with this DMCA notification.  I would like to refer you to our TOS/AUP located here: http://hostdrive.com/about/policies/tos/contract.html and http://hostdrive.com/about/policies/aup/index.html

Specifically Item number 12.

 Copyright or trademark infringement: Use of the HostDrive.Com service to transmit any material (by e-mail, uploading, posting or otherwise) that infringes any copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret or other proprietary rights of any third party, including, but not limited to, the unauthorized copying of copyrighted material, the digitization and distribution of photographs from magazines, books, or other copyrighted sources, and the unauthorized transmittal of copyrighted software.

As such we ask that you refrain from the transfer of this copyrighted material and destroy and remaining copyrighted material pertaining to this infringement notice at this time.  Please advice us when this is done so that we may respond to this DMCA notification in a timely manner and to avoid any interruption in service as a result of this infringement.

Thank you.

-
Regards,

Bella Mia, Inc.
Internet Abuse Services
